ModMetaData.name: RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.8[/h1]
This mod changes [b]Vanilla[/b] trait colors according to their commonality using the RimTraits colouring scheme.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Vanilla trait colouring [*]Modded trait colouring (4 mods) [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talents[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508292711][KV] More Trait Slots - 1.2[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508850027]RimHUD[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1855885448]Guard For Me[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*][Minor Conflict] Conflicts with mods that changes trait colour based on commonality. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for RimTraits - General Traits. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for Vanilla Fishing Expanded. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for Vanilla Traits Expanded. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional). [/list]
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
[b]Balance:[/b] Balance is not particular relevant in this mod, as commonality is unaltered or dependent on mod usage.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]Ogliss for helping me figure out how patching works. [*]Gouda quiche for helping me figure out how patching works. [/list]
[h1]Latest Changes:[/h1] [b]v1.7[/b] [list] [*][Support] Added Support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1621571024]Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional)[/url] by Alias! [/list]
[b]v1.8[/b] [list] [*][RimWorld 1.3] RimWorld 1.3 Ready. [*][Change] Uncommon Traits now uses a lighter colour for clarity. [/list]
